myServices.name: Name of service
myServices.timeBlockedExplanation: Blocked time is the total time used when making an appointment. This time is different from the additional treatment time, as it includes the total time you need, for example. preparation for the service, cleaning up after the service and similar.

myCalendar.notSetWorkTimeForUser: No working times have been set for this user
myCalendar.connectedThisCalendarWithGoogle: This calendar is connected with google!
myCalendar.selectLocationAndEmployee: Please select location and user to see calendar
myCalendar.selectedPayOnArrivalOption: Client chose the option of payment on arrival.
myCalendar.selectedPayOnline: Client paid amount of #amount € for service.
myCalendar.selectedFullPayment: Client paid full amount for service(#amount €)
myCalendar.selectedPartOfFullPayment: Client paid part of full amount for service(#amount €). The balance in the amount of #amountRest € must be paid upon arrival.

connections.outlookText: Connect your Outlook calendar and synchronize with Termmy

onlinePayment.title: Online payment
onlinePayment.text: Set up payment processing and received money online!

bookingSettings.title: Booking settings
bookingSettings.text: Set up your booking page and customize!
bookingSettings.activeOrDeactiveBookingPage: Active or deactive your booking page
bookingSettings.bookingLinkExists: This booking link exists. Link must to be unique. Please choose some else name
bookingSettings.companyInformationText: Set up your company information and show on first page
bookingSettings.brandingColorPrimary: Choose the primary color of your booking website to match your brand
bookingSettings.brandingColorSecondary: Choose the secondary color of your booking website to match your brand
bookingSettings.brandingColorLight: Choose the color of light elements of your booking website to match your brand
bookingSettings.brandingColorDark: Choose the color of dark elements of your booking website to match your brand
bookingSettings.backgroundColorPrimary: Choose the primary color of your background
bookingSettings.backgroundColorSecondary: Choose the secondary color of your background
bookingSettings.brandingColorSecondaryExplanation: Choose another color for your background if you want to have to gradient or same color like primary if you want one color background look.
bookingSettings.displayCopyrightButton: Display 'Termmy' branding on your booking website
bookingSettings.socialNetworkText: Enter your social network page and show on booking page
bookingSettings.partOfAmount: Allow to client pay part of amount
bookingSettings.allowPayOnArrivalForNewCustomer: Allow pay on arrival for new customer

reminders.title: Reminders
reminders.explanation: With automatic reminders, communication with clients can be improved, missed appointments eliminated and clients returned.
reminders.recommendedExplanation: 97% of people open and read the SMS within the first 10 minutes of receiving it. People read emails much less!

smsReminder.title: SMS Reminder
smsReminder.explanation: With automatic SMS reminders, communication with clients can be improved, missed appointments eliminated and clients returned. You can be sure that customers will see the reminder on time because 97% of people open and read the SMS within the first 10 minutes of receiving it.
smsReminder.pleaseBuySmsOnTime: Please buy the additional sms messages on time.
smsReminder.messageConfigurationExplanation: Here you can configuration, activate or deactive your sms message for different automatization reminders
smsReminder.needToInsertTelephoneAtSettings: You did't set telephone number. Please add it on your settings profile!
smsReminder.warning: Our suggestion is to activate an SMS reminder, because 97% of people open SMS messages within 10 minutes of their arrival.

emailReminder.title: Email Reminder
emailReminder.explanation: With automatic Email reminders, communication with clients can be improved, missed appointments eliminated and clients returned.
emailReminder.messageConfigurationExplanation: Here you can configuration, activate or deactive your emails for different automatization reminders
emailReminder.subject: Subject

signUp.text: Make your app management easy and fun!
signUp.mailExists: This mail address exists. Please enter another email address or reset your password.
signUp.verifyYouMail: Please check your email to verify it.
signUp.passwordNotMatch: Password and Re-password do not match! Need to be same!

forgot.title: Forgot Password? 🔒
forgot.text: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
forgot.sendLinkForResetOnMail: Send link for reset password to this mail address
forgot.mailNotExists: Mail not exists! Please check with other email address!

resetPassword.title: Reset Password 🔒
resetPassword.text: You can change your old password in the following form.
resetPassword.passwordNotMatch: The passwords do not match, please enter the same password in both fields!
resetPassword.changedPasswordSuccessfuly: Changed password successfuly. Now you can login!

verifiedMail.title: Mail is verified! 🙌
verifiedMail.text: Thank you for your signup and verified your mail. Now you can login and configurable your account!

somethingHappenedPage.title: Something unexpected happened! 🤔
somethingHappenedPage.text: There was an error in the previous action. Please try again or contact our support for help.
